name: SocialMediaPanelForImages
author: GRT TEAM

sections.description:
Social Media Panel for Images is plugin to add social buttons on images in posts.
If you want your readers to be able to share post from your blog – this plugin is for you.
You can choose what buttons to show.
Supports next social buttons:

Twitter
Facebook
Google+
Livejournal
Youtube
Vkontakte
LinkedIn
Picasa Web Albums
Flickr
Pinterest
DeviantArt
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload social-media-panel-for-images to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place “ in your templates
